BasicInfo.Notes: Li(2) Bo(2) [32540] CHECK sources cited in Lidai renwu nianli tongpu. JTS, 190C.5053-4. His immediate ancestors were exiled to an area south of Lake Balkash (currently a part of Kazakistan of the former Soviet Union). In 705, his father returned and held office in Rencheng where the family remained. The notes to his biography in JTS provide several inconsistent sources of information. QTW, 347.1a. Literary fragments preserved in QTW. 《唐代人物知識ベース》記其生卒年為：701 - 762.
